column1: The '''Tolkien Estate''' is the legal body which manages the copyrights of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s works. It mainly holds the copyright over the literary texts. Executors of the estate include [[Christopher Tolkien]]
column3: Christopher's nephew [[Michael George Tolkien]] and [[Priscilla Tolkien]]. Cathleen Blackburn of Manches & Co. has been the estate's solicitor for many years.

column1: The film and merchandise rights for ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Hobbit]]'' were sold by J.R.R. Tolkien
column2: and are currently owned by [[Middle-earth Enterprises]]
column4: a company controlled by [[Saul Zaentz]] until his death in 2014.
